summary: Completed backend testing of MVM Module (Multi Vendor Marketplace) - All 10 phases (0-9). All 68 tests passed. TypeScript compilation successful. Module is FROZEN at version mvm-v1.0.0.
critical_code_review_comments: All 25+ event types are properly prefixed with 'mvm.' for module scoping
Commission calculation supports PERCENTAGE, FIXED, and TIERED methods
Commission rule types: GLOBAL, CATEGORY, PRODUCT, VENDOR_TIER, PROMOTIONAL
Order splitting correctly creates sub-orders per vendor with commission calculation

All 9 database tables prefixed with 'mvm_': mvm_vendor_tiers, mvm_vendors, mvm_vendor_staff, mvm_vendor_settings, mvm_vendor_product_mappings, mvm_vendor_commission_rules, mvm_vendor_sub_orders, mvm_vendor_sub_order_items, mvm_vendor_payout_records
Vendor status transitions validated: PENDING_APPROVAL -> APPROVED/REJECTED, APPROVED -> SUSPENDED/CHURNED, SUSPENDED -> APPROVED/CHURNED, REJECTED -> PENDING_APPROVAL, CHURNED -> (terminal)
No forbidden logic found: No billing, payment execution, or money movement in MVM module
MVM correctly extends SVM - no duplication of storefront/cart/checkout/order creation logic

Entitlement service has all expected features (vendors, vendor_onboarding, vendor_dashboard, order_splitting, commission_management, payout_tracking) and limits (max_vendors, max_vendor_staff_per_vendor, max_products_per_vendor, max_commission_rules, max_vendor_tiers)
Offline behavior properly defines safe vs online-required actions
Vendor dashboard has strict data isolation - vendors see ONLY their data
seed_data_creation: No seed data needed - pure TypeScript module testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: MVM Module Phase 0-9 testing complete. Module is FROZEN at mvm-v1.0.0. All business logic validated: VendorEngine, OrderSplittingEngine, CommissionEngine, VendorDataAccess, MVMEventEmitter (25+ events), MVMEntitlementService, MVMConnectivityChecker. Database schema has 9 tables all prefixed with 'mvm_'. No API routes implemented yet - pure TypeScript module. MVM extends SVM as peer dependency.

Event Types Validation.Vendor lifecycle events: PASS - created, approved, suspended, rejected, churned

Order Splitting.splitOrder: PASS - Splits parent order into vendor sub-orders
Order Splitting.Status transitions: PASS - PENDING -> ACCEPTED -> PROCESSING -> READY_TO_SHIP -> SHIPPED -> DELIVERED

Database Schema.No Core modifications: PASS - References Core via String IDs only

mocked_apis.MVM Module: Pure TypeScript module - no API routes implemented yet
